inactionCost.title: The Cost of Doing Nothing
consequences: Big 4 deploy AI at scale, undercutting rates by 40%
Platform Giants embed AI-AMS into existing tools (ServiceNow, Datadog)
Your talent leaves for AI-first competitors

strategicPaths.name: Fast Follower
strategicPaths.description: Deploy AI to match competitor capabilities and protect existing revenue
keyInitiatives: Pilot AI coding assistants (GitHub Copilot, Cursor) across 100 developers
Automate L1 support with AI chatbots (67% ticket reduction)
Partner with 3-5 Tier 2 startups for quick wins
strategicPaths.bestFor: Companies prioritizing stability and risk mitigation over growth

strategicPaths.name: Market Leader
strategicPaths.description: Build comprehensive AI-AMS platform to win new clients and premium pricing
keyInitiatives: Deploy full AI-AMS stack across all 7 SDLC phases (55+ use cases)
Build AI-Human Collaboration model (L2 evolution to 43% higher productivity)
Create AI Governance framework (NIST AI RMF, EU AI Act compliance)
Strategic partnerships with 5-7 Tier 1 startups (equity stakes)
Launch AI-AMS Center of Excellence (upskill 85% workforce)
strategicPaths.bestFor: Companies ready to lead the AI transformation and capture market share

strategicPaths.name: Industry Disruptor
strategicPaths.description: Build proprietary AI platform to become the new category leader
keyInitiatives: Develop proprietary AI-AMS platform (custom models, IP ownership)
Create new AI-native service offerings (outcome-based pricing)
Build AI research lab (partnership with OpenAI, Anthropic, Google)
Launch industry-first AI guarantees (SLA automation, autonomous resolution)
strategicPaths.bestFor: Market leaders with capital, vision, and appetite for industry transformation

immediate: Form AI Strategy Task Force (C-suite + tech leads)
Pilot 3-5 high-impact AI use cases (90-day sprints)
Map current workforce to future AI roles
30days: Select strategic path based on decision framework
Secure executive commitment and budget allocation
Launch AI training program for leadership team
90days: Execute pilot projects and measure ROI
Establish AI governance and ethics framework

callToAction.title: The Window Is Closing
callToAction.message: The companies that move now will define the future of AI-AMS. The rest will be disrupted.
nextSteps: Schedule AI-AMS Strategy Workshop with your leadership team
Request detailed implementation roadmap for your chosen path
Connect with AI-AMS experts for readiness assessment
